attributes.action: Re-nationalise the railways and solve the traffic congestion problem in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Traffic congestion could be reduced significantly in the UK if the railways were re-nationalised. many people choose to drive to work because in most cases it is quicker and cheaper than travelling by train.

If the network was re-nationalised (i.e not having separate companies such as first great western etc) services would be more cheaper, cleaner and more reliable while still providing a profit for the Government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
